DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, non-randomized, controlled study to investigate the clinical outcome of surgery using the Harmonic knife vs the HF knife in patients requiring abdominoplastic surgery or body lift (Lockwood)
DOC.brief_title: Harmonic vs HF Knife in Patients Requiring Abdominal Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Aim of the study is to measure amount of seroma in each interventional arm.
DOC.criteria: 18 years willing to give consent indication for abdominoplastic surgery no contraindication for general anaesthesia Smoking more than 10 p/day Diabetes mellitus I or II known neoplasms not willing or able to conform with study requirements
